tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE machine_events (
    event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_id UUID,
    event_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    event_type VARCHAR(255),
    event_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE machine_sensors (
    sensor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_id UUID,
    sensor_type VARCHAR(255),
    sensor_location VARCHAR(255),
    sensor_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_id UUID,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(255),
    maintenance_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
    schedule_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_id UUID,
    scheduled_maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_status VARCHAR(255),
    maintenance_engineer UUID
);

CREATE TABLE SensorData (
    sensor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_id UUID REFERENCES Machines(machine_id),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    sensor_type STRING,
    sensor_value FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLogs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_id UUID REFERENCES Machines(machine_id),
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_type STRING,
    maintenance_details STRING
);

CREATE TABLE Alerts (
    alert_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_id UUID REFERENCES Machines(machine_id),
    alert_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    alert_details STRING,
    alert_level STRING
);
